name: A Welcome Shower
description:
Come outside and enjoy the first rain of autumn! Explore to your heart's content and keep your eye out for hidden delights. I hope you have fun!

Produced in Bitsy, various game hacks applied via Borksy.

Audio clip by Alexander on Orange Free Sounds, used in accordance with Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License, and implemented via BitsyMuse.

This game was inspired by the rain that followed the devastating Oregon wildfires of 2020. While the immediate danger from those fires is past, countless people had their lives disrupted and many have suffered devastating losses. If you'd like to help with relief efforts, please consider donating to one of the organizations listed here.
